=#{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_date =#{item.lastUpdateDate}, last_update_ip =#{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, is_contract_related =#{item.contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_total_price =#{item.contractTotalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_supplier =#{item.contractSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_operator =#{item.guaranteePeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_01 =#{item.attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_02 =#{item.attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_03 =#{item.attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, =#{item.attribute18,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_19 =#{item.attribute19,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_20 =#{item.attribute20,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_derive =#{item.isDerive,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{item.id} and version =#{item.version};

mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.is_contract_related , t1.apply_type , t1.apply_id , t1.apply_device_name , t1.apply_num , t1.apply_price , t1.apply_spec , t1.apply_model , t1.apply_manufacturer , t1.contract_id , t1.contract_num , t1.contract_name , t1.contract_total_price , t1.contract_supplier , t1.contract_operator , t1.contract_device_name , t1.contract_device_num , t1.contract_device_price , t1.contract_device_total_price , t1.contract_spec , t1.contract_model , t1.contract_manufacturer , t1.contract_state , t1.GUARANTEE_PERIOD , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.is_derive from assets_apply_module t1 where t1.apply_id = #{applyId} and not (t1.is_derive = 'Y')
